Table1.News title: Employers: want to help your employees get vaccinated?
Table1.News content: Find out how to host a mobile COVID-19 vaccination clinic, partner with an offsite vaccination event, or display vaccine education posters in our Employer Vaccination Toolkit.

Table1.News title: New low in statewide cases as California reaches 35 million vaccinations
Table1.News content: The state has topped 35 million vaccinations, and that’s having a big effect on our case rate. For three days in a row, California has had less than 1,000 new cases a day.

Table1.News title: California will align its mask guidance with CDC’s on June 15, 2021
Table1.News content: California will keep existing mask guidance in place until June 15 when it aims to fully reopen the economy. After that, the state plans to allow fully-vaccinated Californians to go without a mask in most indoor settings. You will still have the option to wear a mask if you choose.
